general_advisory: Rice grains must be dried under sun for 3-4 days to 14% moisture for consumption and 12% moisture for seed purpose. There may be chances of infestation of sucking pests, leaf blight, powdery mildew in the crops and vegetables.

advisory: Post harvesting stage: Rodent - Place Aluminium Phosphide with mud which will kill the rodents.
Vegetative stage: Aphids - Spray Neem Based Pesticide 1500 PPM @ 600 ml/acre.
Vegetative stage: Tobacco Caterpillar - Monitor the emergence of adult moths by setting up Pheromone traps.
Vegetative stage: Hoeing and hand weeding, high ridges for tubers, irrigate crop at 7-8 days interval.
Vegetative stage: Late blight - Spray 2.5 g Metalaxyl + Mancozeb/lit of water for initial infection stage.
Vegetative - Fruit formation stage: Fruit and shoot borer - Spray Neem based pesticide 1500 ppm @ 600 ml/acre.
